page.title: 06ARRIVING IN MILTON KEYNES
page.content: My name is Dat Than. this is how I came to Milton Keynes. I was born in Vietnam. At age five I had to move to England so our family went into a small boat. We set off , it was a rough journey and our family faced shipwreck at sea but luckily we got rescued. We were taken to Hong Kong, there we stayed at a large police station for a few weeks then we were taken to the airport and flown to England. There I stayed at Bournemouth for a few months in a refugee camp but the refugee camp became too full so our family had to move to another place. They took our family to Milton Keynes and that's how I came here.
